body_html:
The only bazel command without "pip" on installation page is this:

$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer

and it fails:

ERROR: Loading of target '//tools/jdk:jdk' failed; build aborted: no such package 'tools/jdk': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.075s

What is this "tools/jdk"? I do have jdk installed.

body:
The only bazel command without "pip" on installation page is this:

```
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
```

and it fails:

```
ERROR: Loading of target '//tools/jdk:jdk' failed; build aborted: no such package 'tools/jdk': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.075s
```

What is this "tools/jdk"? I do have jdk installed.
